Package Email

Interface Summary
Folder Means of holding Messages
Mailbox Root folder of all messages allowing direct lookup of special purpose folder
Message Object to represent a Message
 

Class Summary
DummyStore DummyStore is for testing purposes
FileSystemFolder Implementation of File System
FileSystemMailbox File System Mailbox retrieves the respective messages or sub folders for the folders from the persistent storage system
MessageController Message controller class
PlainTextMessage Implementation of Message as something that can be stored as a String;
Summary Summary Class is for getting/setting fields like Date,From,To,CC,BCC,Subject from/to the message
TemporaryFolder An empty folder with no backing store for testing
